question: When was the Customs Excise and Service Tax Appellate Tribunal (CESTAT) constituted?
explanation: The Customs Excise and Service Tax Appellate Tribunal (CESTAT) which was formerly known as Customs, Excise & Gold (Control) Appellate Tribunal was constituted on 11 th October 1982. It was constituted under Article 323(B) of the Constitution of India by making provisions in the Customs Act 1962.
